¾ cup warm whole milk,1 package active dry yeast,4 ½ cups all-purpose flour,3 large eggs, beaten,⅓ cup white granulated sugar,1 teaspoon fine salt,6 tablespoons unsalted butter, very soft,4 tablespoons unsalted butter for laminating dough,½ cup dark chocolate chunks,1 large whole egg for brushing,coarse sea salt,white granulated sugar,,
